bibdata.title: AIEE American Tentative Standards for Railway Motors and Other Rotating Electrical Machinery on Rail Cars and Locomotives
AIEE American Tentative Standards for Railway Motors and Other Rotating Electrical Machinery on Rail Cars and Locomotives

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The rules in this division of American Standards cover definitions, classification, rating and methods of test for rotating electrical machinery forming a part of the power equipment of electrically propelled railway cars and locomotives.

The rules in this division of American Stand­ards cover definitions, classification, rating and and methods of test for rotating electrical machin­ery forming a part of the power equipment of electrically propelled railway cars and locomo­tives.
